skill.name: social-media-analyzer
skill.description: Analyzes social media campaign performance across platforms with engagement metrics, ROI calculations, and audience insights for data-driven marketing decisions
skill.summary: Analyzes social media campaign performance across platforms with engagement metrics, ROI calculation...
skill.author: alirezarezvani

security_audit.summary: All 8 static findings are false positives. The scanner misidentified markdown code formatting as shell execution and benign documentation text containing 'ROI' as cryptographic patterns. The codebase contains only mathematical calculations for engagement metrics and no dangerous patterns.

content.value_statement: Marketing teams struggle to quantify social media ROI and benchmark performance across platforms. This skill calculates engagement rates, click-through metrics, and cost efficiency to deliver actionable optimization recommendations.
actual_capabilities: Calculate engagement rate across likes, comments, shares, and saves
Measure click-through rate and cost per engagement
Compare campaign performance against industry benchmarks
Identify top-performing posts by engagement metrics
Generate ROI analysis with cost efficiency metrics
Provide actionable recommendations for campaign optimization
limitations: Requires manual data input from social media platform exports
Industry benchmarks are general guidelines and vary by niche
Cannot access real-time data directly from social platforms
Historical performance does not guarantee future results

use_cases.title: Client Performance Reports
use_cases.description: Analyze client campaigns and deliver data-backed insights with benchmark comparisons.

use_cases.title: Campaign ROI Tracking
use_cases.description: Calculate return on ad spend and identify which content drives the most engagement.

use_cases.title: Content Performance Optimization
use_cases.description: Identify top-performing post types and optimize future content strategy.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Campaign Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this Instagram campaign data and tell me which posts performed best based on engagement rate.

prompt_templates.title: ROI Calculation
prompt_templates.prompt: Calculate the ROI on this Facebook ad campaign with $1,200 spend and these click metrics.

prompt_templates.title: Cross-Platform Comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare our engagement rates across Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn for the last month.

prompt_templates.title: Full Performance Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a complete analysis on this campaign data including benchmarks, top posts, and optimization recommendations.

output_examples.input: Analyze this Instagram campaign with 3 posts: post 1 has 342 likes, 28 comments, 15 shares, 45 saves, 5200 reach, 8500 impressions, 120 clicks. Post 2 has 587 likes, 42 comments, 31 shares, 68 saves, 8900 reach, 12400 impressions, 215 clicks. Post 3 has 298 likes, 19 comments, 12 shares, 34 saves, 4100 reach, 6800 impressions, 95 clicks.
output: Top performer: Post 2 with 8.21% engagement rate (above Instagram benchmark of 1.22%)
Average engagement rate: 6.14% (excellent performance vs industry)
Recommendation: Replicate video content strategy and posting time from post 2

output_examples.input: Calculate ROI for Facebook campaign with $500 spend. Total engagements: 2500, total clicks: 120.
output: Campaign is highly efficient - consider scaling budget

best_practices: Provide complete metrics (likes, comments, shares, saves, reach, impressions, clicks) for accurate analysis
Compare metrics within the same time periods for fair platform comparisons
Consider platform-specific benchmarks when evaluating performance (Instagram differs from LinkedIn)
anti_patterns: Analyzing campaigns without specifying the platform (each has different benchmarks)
Comparing organic and paid metrics together without separation
Drawing conclusions from fewer than 10 posts (insufficient data for reliable insights)

faq.question: What data do I need to provide?
faq.answer: Likes, comments, shares, saves, reach, impressions, clicks, platform name, and ad spend amount.

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok with platform-specific benchmarks.

faq.question: How is engagement rate calculated?
faq.answer: Total engagements divided by reach, multiplied by 100 to get percentage.

faq.question: What are the industry benchmarks?
faq.answer: Pre-configured benchmarks include engagement rates and CTR for each supported platform.

faq.question: Can this skill access live data?
faq.answer: No, you must provide campaign data from platform exports or analytics tools.

faq.question: What format does the skill accept?
faq.answer: JSON data structures, CSV exports, or natural language descriptions of key metrics.
